      ¬</\0\/1>Ex.x
      ¬</\L>Ex.x
      ¬?+eval
      ¬<Z>+Q
      PrevSpeaker(V)
      Assert(V)
      Assert(W)
      ¬V=W
THEN  IF    (+neg || <Z>+neg)
      THEN  abort
      ELSE  put(sa:accept(V))
ELSE  abort
